precondition: The "Program Manager" window is open and the "Main" program group is visible.
action: Double Left Click on the "Control Panel" icon.

precondition: The "Control Panel" window is open and the "Printers" icon is highlighted.
The "Printers" window of the Windows 3.1 Control Panel is open. A list box titled "List of Printers: Install Unlisted or Updated Printer" is visible and contains a vertical scroll bar.
action: Click the down arrow of the vertical scroll bar located on the "List of Printers: Install Unlisted or Updated Printer" list box.
expected_results: The list of available printer models in the "List of Printers: Install Unlisted or Updated Printer" list box will scroll down, revealing additional printer options.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open and the "List of Printers" displays available printer models.
action: Move the mouse pointer over the "Install..." button.

precondition: The "Printers" window within the Windows 3.1 Control Panel is open. The "List of Printers" box should be visible, displaying a list of available printers. A scroll bar should be present to navigate the list of printers.
action: Click the down arrow button on the scroll bar of the "List of Printers" list box.
expected_results: The "List of Printers" will scroll down, revealing additional printers in the list.

precondition: The "Printers" window within the Windows 3.1 Control Panel is open. The "List of Printers:" list box should be visible.
action: Click and hold the down arrow of the vertical scroll bar located on the "List of Printers:" list box.
expected_results: Additional printer models will be displayed in the "List of Printers:" list box.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open. The "HP LaserJet" is selected in the "List of Printers" list box.
expected_results: The "Installed Printers" list will include "HP LaserJet on LPT1:". The "Set As Default Printer" and "Remove" buttons will become active.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open and the "Set As Default Printer" button is disabled.
action: Move the mouse pointer over the "Install..." button.
expected_results: The "Set As Default Printer" button will become active.

precondition: The "Printers" window is open. The mouse cursor is hovering over the down arrow of the vertical scroll bar of the "List of Printers:" list box.
action: Click the down arrow of the vertical scroll bar in the "List of Printers:" list box.
expected_results: The "List of Printers" box will display an updated list of printer models.
